summary: Frontend Testing Complete - useMemo filteredReservations and DELETE_UI logs verified. All 6 test cases PASSED. The refactored code using useMemo for filteredReservations works correctly. Search filtering is instant. DELETE_UI logs show state transitions (e.g., 'Réservations filtrées: 2 -> 1'). QR Scanner opens without ReferenceError crash.
passed_tests: Test 1: Build compiles without error - Frontend loads correctly ✅
Test 2: useMemo filteredReservations filters by name correctly (TestUser_Filter1 → 1 result) ✅
Test 3: useMemo filteredReservations filters by WhatsApp correctly (+41790002222 → 1 result) ✅
Test 4: Result counter 'X résultat(s)' displays correctly during search ✅
Test 5: QR Scanner opens WITHOUT ReferenceError crash - shows 'Activer la caméra' and 'Saisie manuelle' ✅
Test 6: DELETE_UI logs printed correctly: 'Début suppression', 'Réservations filtrées: 2 -> 1', '✅ supprimée' ✅
Test 7: Deleted element disappears INSTANTLY from list (UI updates without page reload) ✅
Test 8: Pagination counter updates correctly after deletion (Affichage 1-1 sur 1 réservations) ✅
critical_code_review_comments: useMemo filteredReservations at lines 1331-1343 correctly depends on [reservations, reservationsSearch]
DELETE_UI logs at lines 700, 705, 711, 713 provide clear state transition visibility
Html5Qrcode CDN at line 52 of index.html loads correctly
QRScannerModal component handles missing Html5Qrcode gracefully
